segments.text: I see this cozy kitchen with sunlight streaming in from the window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is standing there drying a plate so carefully.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's got her apron on and looks so focused on that dish.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But oh no, the sink is overflowing right behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is pouring out like a waterfall onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She hasn't noticed yet, one foot is already in the puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Over there, the boy is on that little stool reaching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks wobbly, like it might tip any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is standing below, holding out her hand for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're being so sneaky while mom's not looking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks peaceful, what a contrast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the stool holds steady for the kids.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could turn into quite the adventure.
segments.speaker: PAR
